name: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical first-person shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Engage in strategic 5v5 battles where every decision counts. Sharpen your skills, communicate with your team, and outmaneuver your opponents to emerge victorious. Will you be the last one standing in this adrenaline-fueled showdown?

name: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike 2 is the next evolution in the legendary FPS series. Experience new maps, refined gameplay, and high-stakes missions that push your skills to the limit. Whether you're defusing bombs or rescuing hostages, every moment is intense. Get ready to dominate the competition in this iconic tactical shooter.

name: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a battle royale game where legends fight for survival in an unforgiving arena. Choose your legend, each with unique abilities, and work with your squad to outsmart, outplay, and outlast your enemies. Fast-paced, strategic, and thrilling, Apex Legends keeps you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

name: FIFA
description: FIFA brings the world of football to life with stunning realism and dynamic gameplay. Control your favorite teams and players as you compete in thrilling matches, tournaments, and leagues. Whether you're scoring the winning goal or defending your lead, every match is a test of skill and strategy. Will you lift the trophy?

name: Doom
description: Doom is a relentless first-person shooter that plunges you into the heart of a demonic invasion. Armed with powerful weapons and quick reflexes, you'll face hordes of enemies in fast-paced, brutal combat. It's a test of survival where every second counts. Are you ready to enter the inferno and battle the forces of Hell?

name: Zero Hour
description: Zero Hour is a tactical, team-based FPS that emphasizes realism and strategy. Engage in high-pressure missions where teamwork, communication, and careful planning are key to success. In this intense, immersive experience, every choice matters, and every move could be your last. Are you prepared for the ultimate tactical challenge?
